## CameraPanAnimationOptions.interpolation property

Specifies interpolation. Defaults to \[\[InterpolationFunction.Linear\]\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interpolation?: InterpolationFunction | ((v: number[], k: number) => number);
```
